## Release Images

### Runtime Base Images

#### For CNB Builds:
- Tag: **`some-registry/run:1.0-tiny-cnb`**
- Digest: `some-registry/run@sha256:some-cnb-sha`

### Build-time Base Images

#### For CNB Builds:
- Tag: **`some-registry/build:1.0-tiny-cnb`**
- Digest: `some-registry/build@sha256:some-cnb-sha`
